participant_1.background:
I enjoy wearing suits that make a statement.
i am learning to play the piano.
I eat my feelings.
I went to the beach to relax and spend time with my family.
summer is my favorite season.

participant_2.background:
My favorite holiday is Halloween because it is a time for fun and celebration.
I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.
I am a twenty five year old comic book collector.
I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

content.text: I'm good, thank you! How about you?
I'm great! I just got back from the beach and I'm feeling refreshed.
That sounds wonderful! I love the beach. I wish I could go more often.
I go every summer with my family. It's a great way to relax and spend time with the people I love.
That sounds amazing. I'm glad you have such a great family.
What's your favorite thing to do at the beach?
I love swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand.
Those all sound like great ways to spend a day at the beach.
They are! I also love going for walks on the beach. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I can imagine. I love the sound of the waves crashing on the shore.
Do you have any plans for Halloween?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to a party or watch some horror movies.
That sounds like fun. I'm going to a party with my friends.
That sounds great! I hope you have a lot of fun.
